g.text: GCP Cloud Run / AWS ECS / Azure Container Apps
Native cloud logging captures all logs
Docker Compose / Docker Swarm / Local Dev
Best for: Development, Self-hosted, Small teams
✓ NO PROMTAIL REQUIRED IN EITHER DEPLOYMENT
Documentation: 1,547 lines (Cloud) | Comprehensive guides with code examples, configurations, and operational runbooks
Stack: Grafana + Prometheus + Loki + TimescaleDB + Alertmanager | No Promtail Required
